entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Audit and cleanup the generic math API docs #69694
    7.0.0
  • W^X concerns with C++/CLI #69691
    7.0.0
  • ECMA-335 addendum should mention that null managed pointers are legal #69690
  • Track removing workaround to not use pthread robust mutexes for named mutexes on arm32/arm64 Linux #69688
    8.0.0
  • ClientWebsocket KeepAliveInterval keeps spawning more keep alive messages in some cases #69684
  • [API Proposal]: Efficiently matching multiple strings. #69682
  • [wasm][aot] Test failure - `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.MarshalTests.MarshalPrimitivesToCS` #69681
  • Failures on Mono Android x64 Release @ Ubuntu.1804.Amd64.Android.29.Open on rolling build of runtime-extra-platforms #69678
  • [API Proposal]: Add AllBitsSet to the IBinaryNumber Interface #69676
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicStream #69675
    7.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Add a hook to start an EventPipe Session from runtime startup #69674
    7.0.0
  • Compiler error when publishing a blazor wasm (MonoAOTCompiler: Unable to compile method 'bool System.DateTimeParse:Lex) #69671
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: WebSockets over HTTP/2 #69669
  • Suboptimal Implementation of Half to Single conversion #69667
  • A single box instruction is preventing JIT from inlining #69665
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_ServerCertificates_Test.UseCallback_BadCertificate_ExpectedPolicyErrors(url: \"https://wrong.host.badssl.com/\", expectedErrors: RemoteCertificateNameMismatch) #69664
  • Test failure GC/API/GC/GetTotalPauseDuration/GetTotalPauseDuration.sh #69662
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\virtualstubdispatch\\bigvtbl\\bigvtbl_cs_d\\bigvtbl_cs_d.cmd #69661

Closed

  • Add rich type for reading X509 Authority Information Access #68792
    7.0.0
  • Does the LibraryImportGenerator work for csharp projects only or any? #69233
    7.0.0
  • libraries-jitstress failure in System.Diagnostics.Tests.StackFrameTests.Ctor_FNeedFileInfo #69154
  • P/Invoke string encoding doesn't work properly in some cases #69660
  • Vector test failures on tvos on the rolling build #1774196 #69424
  • Follow-up for Assembly.GetCallingAssembly() - tests and stack walk #69251
    7.0.0
  • JIT perf: Span.Slice(0, ...) emits unnecessary 64-bit extensions #69200
    7.0.0
  • Erratic behavior marshaling derived classes to native code #60803
    7.0.0
  • `BackgroundService` is started before `Host` is started. #69658
  • HTTP/3: RemoteCertificateValidationCallback to allow invalid TLS certification isn't working #68958
    7.0.0
  • Desktop: System.ConfigurationTests.SectionGroupsTests.SimpleSectionGroup failed with "System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException" #21527
    Future
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException is not marked as [Serializable] #42154
    Future
  • string.LastIndexOf(char, int, int) doesn't work #69666
  • MAX_CONNECTION_STRING_LENGTH = 1024 too short for Azure OAuth Token #64940
  • Desktop: Tests under "MonoTests.System.Configuration.ConfigurationManagerTest" failed with "System.NullReferenceException" #21528
    Future
  • Assert - Type Too Big to log for ETW #6027
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix W^X executable memory releasing on Unix #69697
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Don't pin managed collection objects when the contents are non-blittable. #69696
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [WIP] Aggressive GC #69695
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Disable test with the correct path #69693
  • Disabling test that is hitting out of memory exceptions in some platforms #69692
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    area-Single-File
  • Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69687
    area-Single-File
  • [mono] Cleanup main.c/main-sgen.c split, unused glib functions, Apple compression etc #69686
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix handling of hardware exceptions in native code on Unix #69685
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove more uses of StringBuilderCache #69683
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Cleanup idle rate limiters #69677
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] retrieve results from browser bench sample #69673
  • Enable W^X by default #69672
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting of DacpHeapSegmentData::highAllocMark on DAC side. #69670
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • OpenSslX509ChainProcessor: ignore NotSignatureValid on last element. #69668
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Better createdump error messages #69663
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • [wasm] Don't fail the CI job if Firefox tests fail in `runtime-wasm` #69615
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update debpkg container image to ubuntu 18 #68351
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Add X509AuthorityInformationAccessExtension #69629
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add arm64 support for EnC #69679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exposing `Radix` and the remaining `Is*` generic-math APIs #69651
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Limit AnalyzerLanguage in LibraryImportGenerator to C# #69680
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • JIT: redundant branch destructure dominating and/or #69291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [Mono] Correct the behavior of Equals #69499
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Dispose of processes launched in host tests #69625
    test-bug, area-Host
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Use IntegralRange in fgOptimizeRelationalComparisonWithCasts #69247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update NoTargets SDK and clean-up code #69597
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix native sourcelink support #69598
  • Use a better endpoint for backport workflows runs #69617
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Rename and reenable test #69648
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Switch from malloc to stackAlloc for bindings invokes #69698
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve regex derivative construction #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement vpblendvb optimization in the JIT #69509
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix incremental XxHash32/XxHash64 #69185
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added `--git_diff` option SPMI asm diffs #69572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Consolidate interop tables generators #69620
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [MONO][DRAFT] Factor marshal-lightweight out of marshal-ilgen #69208
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add CopyString and ValueIsEscaped APIs to Utf8JsonReader #69580
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add integer type discriminator support to System.Text.Json polymorphism #69326
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Optimization for "~x + 1" to "-x" (#69003) #69600
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Allow source generation for classes with ignored init-only props #69327
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Libraryimport src gen audit #69619
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Enable SIMD for vectors of nint/nuint. #69647
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, needs-author-action
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Make superpmi.py collect work on crashes/assertion failures #69494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Apply MaxResponseHeadersLength limit to trailing headers #69250
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, community-contribution
  • Handle "mis-sized" structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Display parents' members on GetProperties. #68907
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use correct AOT annotation on JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverterFromAttribute #69520
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
